details.arabic_diacless: معاذ اللٰه‌ انهٗ ربي احسن مثواى‌ؕ انهٗ لا يفلح الظٰلمون‏
details.arabic: مَعَاذَ اللّٰهِ‌ اِنَّهٗ رَبِّيْٓ اَحۡسَنَ مَثۡوَاىَ‌ؕ اِنَّهٗ لَا يُفۡلِحُ الظّٰلِمُوۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: maAAatha Allahi innahu rabbee ahsanamathwaya innahu la yuflihu aththalimoon
details.translations: "[I seek] the refuge of Allah . Indeed, he is my master, who has made good my residence. Indeed, wrongdoers will not succeed."
